name: Heroku
description: This deploys your app stack to Heroku
postActions: Add HEROKU_EMAIL to Github repository secrets
Add HEROKU_API_KEY to Github repository secrets
Add REACT_APP_BACKEND_API_URL to Github repository secrets. It should be the backend app name listed in file .github/workflows/heroku_deploy.yml section heroku_apps
Create applications with names (appname) listed in .github/workflows/heroku_deploy.yml section heroku_apps
